sentences.sContent: This results agree with that of isothermal crystallization kinetics.
sentences.sContent_eng: This results agree with that of isothermal crystallization kinetics.
sentences.sCn: 这一结果同等温结晶相一致。

sentences.sContent: A simple computational model for isothermal phase change problem was based on the enthalpy formulation.
sentences.sContent_eng: A simple computational model for isothermal phase change problem was based on the enthalpy formulation.
sentences.sCn: 基于焓法模型导出了一种求解等温相变问题的简单计算模型。

sentences.sContent: The effect of isothermal forging temperature on microstructure and mechanical properties of2B70 aluminum alloy was studied.
sentences.sContent_eng: The effect of isothermal forging temperature on microstructure and mechanical properties of2B70 aluminum alloy was studied.
sentences.sCn: 研究了不同等温锻造温度对2B70铝合金显微组织与力学性能的影响。
